relationships.description: Wolff wrote books about Trump's White House
D'Ancona will be in conversation with Wolff at the event

analysis.purpose: To promote an event featuring Michael Wolff discussing his book about Trump's White House
analysis.significance: Marketing email for an event discussing insider perspectives on the Trump administration

notable_quotes: "It's time to return to the madness and chaos of the Trump White House as the bestselling Fire and Fury author delivers wickedly entertaining insights from Year Two of the most divisive presidency in history."
"Discover just how close this most abnormal of presidencies has come to breaking point..."

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this promotional email

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a promotional email for a literary event

details: Event features journalists/authors Michael Wolff and Matthew d'Ancona
References to media coverage and book reviews from Telegraph, GQ, Vanity Fair, Washington Post, Sunday Times

public_knowledge.context: Michael Wolff's books about the Trump White House were widely publicized and controversial bestsellers

analysis.summary: Promotional email from How To Academy advertising an event featuring Michael Wolff discussing his book about the Trump White House, with journalist Matthew d'Ancona moderating the conversation on June 21, 2019 in London.
